entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
